Venue

The main events of Eskhaton will be held at the Squantum Association. This beautiful facility provides us a spacious and varied canvas on which to play, from the comfortable clubhouse to the isolated and mysterious Whortleberry Island.

Squantum Association
947 Veterans Memorial Parkway
Riverside, RI 02915
